name: Moustache-engine
tagline: 3D engine free for use (check licensing for more information)
body:
### What is it?
MOUSTACHE Engine is a [free-to-use](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) 3D engine currently in development under [TSOYM Games](https://www.facebook.com/TSOYM-Games-175187832872905/). It is being written for [ZETH](https://www.facebook.com/zeththegame/), an upcoming oldschool shooter inspired by such classics as DOOM and Quake (both DOOM and Quake are trademarks owned by id Software)

### When is it getting released?
The estimated release date of ZETH is 17th May 2018. MOUSTACHE Engine will be released a week after that.

### The team
[TSOYM Games](https://www.facebook.com/TSOYM-Games-175187832872905/) is an independant company based in Ostrava, Czech Republic. ZETH and MOUSTACHE Engine are their first major projects.

### Contributors
The MOUSTACHE Engine would not exist without the help of the very talented Matěj Štágl. His contributions include shaders (SSAO, texture mapping, ...).

### Wanna contribute to the project?
That is great! Please contact us at [tsoym@email.com](mailto:tsoym@email.com?subject=Contribution).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
